description: An adaptation of Bananya, the banana cat mascot of the stationary company Q-Lia.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Primarily Animal Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed animal or animal-like characters.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

Takeshi Onaka is a Flash animator, character designer and screenwriter. He does a lot of surreal comedy shorts.
